scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../Part_2_rendering_collections && npm run build -- prod && cp -r build ../Part_3_nodejs/Part_3a
scripts.deploy: cd ../../../ && git subtree push --prefix Lessons/Part_3_nodejs/Part_3a heroku-notes master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && npm run deploy
